externalVocabularies.label: External controlled vocabularies
externalVocabularies.helperText: Select external vocabularies that need to be mapped to corresponding concepts in this taxonomy.

mapConcepts.heading: Map concepts
mapConcepts.description: Map your concepts to corresponding concepts in the selected external controlled vocabulary. Concept mapping helps maintain meaning across different systems and is applied on export.
mapConcepts.switchVocabularyMessage: Removing or replacing the existing vocabulary deletes all concept mappings. This cannot be undone.

concepts.heading: Concept list
concepts.description: Manage a hierarchical list of concepts for the taxonomy, in all calendar language(s). Concepts are available for selection from the mapped input field. Drag concepts to rearrange and/or nest them. When you move a concept in one language, it is moved in all languages.
concepts.deleteConceptMessage: Deleting this concept also deletes its subconcepts, instances of usage, and mappings to external vocabularies. This cannot be undone.
